headline.main: BRITISH PLANT SHIFT RELEASES 144,000 MEN; 45,000,000 Square Feet of Plant Space Are Also Obtained

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Oct. 12 -- Since the start of the government's plan for the concentration of industries about 144,000 workers have been released for other employment, according to latest figures available in London today. In addition, about 45,000,000 square feet of fac- tory space have also been released.
abstract: rept on manpower and plant space released to war industries by indus merger plan
